title: Exquisite Pink Sapphire & Diamond Floral Haaram - A Contemporary Classic
materials: Crafted in a durable alloy with rose gold and white gold plating
this haaram features brilliant-cut white diamonds and vibrant pink sapphires. The stones are set in a secure pave setting. Finished with a Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: This contemporary take on the traditional Haaram showcases a delicate floral motif. Intricate detailing on the petals enhances the sparkle of the diamonds and the vibrant hues of the sapphires. Features a floral pendant at the bottom. The design blends modern aesthetics with a touch of South Indian tradition.
colors: Features a stunning color palette of rose gold
and vivid pink. The pink sapphires add a pop of color
while the white diamonds provide a brilliant contrast.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for a Seemantham or half-saree function when paired with a contemporary saree or lehenga.
description: This haaram is a unique blend of modern design and South Indian sensibility. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty. It is a versatile piece that can be worn for both traditional and contemporary events. The floral design symbolizes new beginnings and joy, making it a meaningful gift for a loved one.
